# WKTextInputMode.plain

**Case**

Text from dictation and suggestions only. Do not allow emoji of any kind.

## Declaration

```swift
case plain
```

## Constants

- **WKTextInputMode.allowEmoji**: Text from dictation and suggestions plus non animated emoji.
- **WKTextInputMode.allowAnimatedEmoji**: Text from dictation and suggestions plus both animated and non animated emoji.

items.description: Text from dictation and suggestions plus non animated emoji.
items.name: WKTextInputMode.allowEmoji

items.description: Text from dictation and suggestions plus both animated and non animated emoji.
items.name: WKTextInputMode.allowAnimatedEmoji
